subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Robert K. Kraft, the chairman of the Patriots, said he was eager for the N.F.L. to talk to a former employee who has intimated that he has evidence of the team’s videotaping practices.
snippet: Robert K. Kraft, the chairman of the Patriots, said he was eager for the N.F.L. to talk to a former employee who has intimated that he has evidence of the team’s videotaping practices.
